name: gravity gun defender
description:
My first real dive into coding. It's probably super messy, but I learned a ton!

Also: very not finished.

The theme for GMTK jam 2019 was "only one". I tried to make something based on only one mechanic.

It's a space shooter kind of thing where you have to defend a base from waves of enemies, but there's a twist; you only have a gravity gun, similar to HL2. Use it to grab enemies and projectiles and hurl them at other enemies!
